draw_prompt: A vibrant fish market stall overflowing with fresh raw seafood: glistening whole fish with pearlescent scales, pink shrimp curled on ice, opened oysters revealing pearly flesh, and spiky lobsters. Wet wooden crates and melting ice cubes create a fresh oceanic atmosphere, with bright yellow lemons and green herbs scattered around. Sharp focus, vivid colors, photorealistic style.
